borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: EAST SIDE OF SUSSEX HOUSE, No.12 UPPER MALL - IN FURNIVAL GARDENS	G1	Hornbeam (Carpinus betulus)	4 x trees - Re-Pollard back to previous pollard points removing approximately 2-3m of new growth. Final height 7m and final spread 6m.	T2	Maidenhair Tree (Ginkgo biloba) 20% Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by approximately 1-1.5m to tidy and contain and retain furnishing growth. Ensure cut back on building side to give at least 1.5m. Final height 5m, final spread 4m. 	REAR / WEST SIDE OF SUSSEX HOUSE, No.12 UPPER MALL	T3	Yew (Taxus baccata) Tree growing in neighbours garden - reduce any overhang back to the boundary, removing approx. 1-1.5m of growth. Final height unchanged at 7m and final spread 3m.
